summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty Freee.l.f.'s Jelly Pop Vault features a Dew Primer, Glow Reviver Lip Oil, Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm and Luscious Lip Mask, all in an exclusive pink makeup bag. The delicious formulas grip makeup with a dewy finish, reveal a clean and hydrated complexion, and make lips look nourished and glossy.
details: DetailsIncludesJelly Pop Dew Primer (1.01 oz)Jelly Pop Glow Reviver Lip Oil (0.25 oz)Jelly Pop Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm (2.0 oz)Jelly Pop Luscious Lip Mask (0.15 oz)Jelly Pop One in a Melon Makeup BagBenefits4-piece makeup and skincare set, featuring full-size products from e.l.f.’s limited-edition Jelly Pop collectionComes in a hot pink Jelly Pop makeup bag that’s exclusive to this vault and UltaHelps cleanse and nourish skin, leaving it with a dewy glowHelps nourish lips and adds glossy color and shineGet your slice for a juicy price: just $40!100% vegan, e.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETAe.l.f. is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA™ and manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified™ facilities. Look for the Fair Trade Certified™ seal on your e.l.f. product!Formulated WithoutPhthalates, Parabens, Nonylphenol Ethoxylates, Triclosan, TriclocarbanItem 2644987How To UseHow to use Jelly Pop Dew Primer:Apply makeup primer evenly to face prior to makeup application.Once applied, wait 30 seconds before applying makeup.How to use Jelly Pop Glow Reviver Lip Oil:Wear lip oil lone or as a top coat for a juicy splash of shimmer.How to use Jelly Pop Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm:Scoop out a small amount of cleansing balm with the included spatula and massage onto dry skin, ensuring eyes are closed.Rinse with water or remove with a warm, damp cloth.How to use Jelly Pop Luscious Lip Mask:Use the applicator to apply a generous, even layer of lip mask onto clean, dry lips.Reapply as needed throughout the day or leave on overnight.IngredientsJelly Pop Dew Primer: Water (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, PEG-150 Distearate, Polysorbate 80, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-240/Hdicopolymer Bis-Decyltetradeceth-20 Ether, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Potassium Laurate, Tocopherol, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool. May Contain: Red 40 (CI 16035).Jelly Pop Glow Reviver Lip Oil: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Polyisobutene, Dextrin Palmitate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Squalane, Fragrance (Parfum), Tocopheryl Acetate, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Diisostearyl Malate, Simethicone, Tin Oxide, Water (Aqua), Tocopherol, Butylene Glycol, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 40 Lake (CI 16035), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492).Jelly Pop Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm: Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Triethylhexanoin, Hydrogenated Polydecene, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Synthetic Wax, PEG-10 Isostearate, Water (Aqua), Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Polysorbate 20, Cholesterol, Xanthan Gum, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Ceramide EOP, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.Jelly Pop Luscious Lip Mask: Triisostearin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentaisostearate, Dextrin Palmitate, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Simethicone, Water (Aqua), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butylene Glycol, Maltodextrin, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Calcium Pantothenate, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Urea, Magnesium Lactate, Papain, Phenoxyethanol, Soluble Collagen, Potassium Lactate, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Magnesium Chloride, Proline, Alanine, Serine, Sodium Citrate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool. May Contain: Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: How to use Jelly Pop Dew Primer:Apply makeup primer evenly to face prior to makeup application.Once applied, wait 30 seconds before applying makeup.How to use Jelly Pop Glow Reviver Lip Oil:Wear lip oil lone or as a top coat for a juicy splash of shimmer.How to use Jelly Pop Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm:Scoop out a small amount of cleansing balm with the included spatula and massage onto dry skin, ensuring eyes are closed.Rinse with water or remove with a warm, damp cloth.How to use Jelly Pop Luscious Lip Mask:Use the applicator to apply a generous, even layer of lip mask onto clean, dry lips.Reapply as needed throughout the day or leave on overnight.
ingredients: Linalool.Jelly Pop Luscious Lip Mask: Triisostearin

reviews.headline: Cute
reviews.comments: Love the bag and the colors
